job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtConnected2Fiber is a B2B SaaS Go To Market platform for the connectivity industryampnbspLaunched in 2015 Connected2Fiber is a VC funded high growth SaaS company based in Milford MA and operating globally The Connected World the core platform of Connected2Fiber drives growth for our clients by increasing visibility to the market managing location and driving engagement as the system of record for where connectivity providers connect and pass by in the commercial marketampnbspConnected2Fiber is one of the nations fastest growing vertical SaaS companiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtConnected2Fiber software engineers build state of the art products that improve human interactions with technology We seek software engineers to be strong in computer science solid in the fundamentals and ready to tackle new software patterns focused on maintainability scalability and security Whether its finding new and innovative ways to advance our product quality or building apps that automatically synchronize information in a secure and convenient way you will be developing solutions to some of the most challenging technical problems out there There are no textbooks that can help you learn this which is why we have some of the best and brightest engineers working with usltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDesign write test deliver maintain and improve softwareltligtltligtHelp with supporting our productsltligtltligtManage priorities and deliverablesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelor of Science in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligtExperience working with one or more from the following web application development mobile application development security software developmentltligtltligtExperience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to CC Python C Java NodeltligtltligtProficient in EnglishltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtWhats In It For YoultugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCompetitive salary ltligtltligtGenerous benefits package includes health dental vision unlimited PTO and 401kampnbspltligtltligtOpportunity to be part of a fun and enthusiastic teamltligtltligtAwesome work environment and cultureltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtLearn more about us at httpswwwconnected2fibercom Check out our Glassdoor reviews Inc Magazine 2021
